name: Top volunteers
template:
{% set checkins = frappe.db.sql("""SELECT c.name, up.username, ifnull(up.user_image, '/files/logo.png') as profile_thumbnail, c.creation, up.first_name as owner, a.activity_name as chapter, a.city, SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(hours_spent))) as checkin_count from `tabVol Checkin` c inner join `tabUser` as up on c.user = up.name inner join `tabVol Activity` as a on c.activity = a.name WHERE date(c.creation) > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 DAY)) group by c.user, c.activity order by checkin_count desc limit %(limit)s""", {"limit": limit}, as_dict=True ) %}

{{ title }}

{{ subtitle }}
{% for checkin in checkins %} {% endfor %}
Name {{ activity }} {{ location }} {{ metric }}
{{loop.index}}. {{ checkin.owner.title() }} {{ checkin.chapter }} {% if checkin.city %} {{ checkin.city }} {% else %} Pan India {%endif%} {{ checkin.checkin_count }}
{% if secondary_button_required %}
{{ botton_label }}
{% endif %}

{{ title }}

{{ subtitle }}

{{ primary_button_label }}

name: User Volunteer
template:
{% set checkins = frappe.db.sql("""SELECT c.name, up.username, a.city, ifnull(up.user_image, '/files/logo.png') as profile_thumbnail, c.creation, up.first_name as owner, a.status, a.activity_name as chapter, SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(hours_spent))) as checkin_count from `tabVol Checkin` c inner join `tabUser` as up on c.user = up.name inner join `tabVol Activity` as a on c.activity = a.name WHERE date(c.creation) > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 DAY)) and up.username = %(username)s group by c.activity order by checkin_count desc limit %(limit)s""", {"limit": limit, "username": args.username}, as_dict=True ) %}

{{ title }}

{{ subtitle }}
{% for checkin in checkins %} {% endfor %}
Activity Duration Activity Status
{{loop.index}}. {{ checkin.chapter }} {{ checkin.checkin_count }} {%if checkin.city %} {{ checkin.city }} {% else %} Pan India {% endif%} {{ checkin.status }}

name: User
